column4: Hi, all ... I'm typing this on my new Dell (not preloaded Ubuntu) that I just got working with an ancient -- and GIGANTIC -- VCON monitor.  It's going to be a MythTV box.  :D
Interesting ... never saw a channel bot set up to do tech support.  Kewlness.  :)
it just has trigger for common answer and links
you get what you pay for
